akn:section.akn:heading: Adoption of revised articles of incorporation.

akn:content.akn:p: Adoption of the revised articles of incorporation of the converted stock company is necessary to implement the plan and shall be governed by the applicable provisions of District law.
For a Class 1 mutual company, the members may adopt the revised articles of incorporation at the same meeting at which the members approve the plan.
For a Class 2 or 3 mutual company, the revised articles of incorporation may be adopted solely by the board of directors or trustees, as provided by District law.
